name: ZooBlocks
description:
A cute, quick and simple puzzle game made in Godot.  Clear as much of the level as you can by clearing groups of Zooblocks!

 Featuring:

  • Cute blocks of animals
  • Physics that make that animals bounce adorably when they land
  • Beautiful artwork by Kenney
  • Beautiful music by Kevin MacLeod
  • Cute sound effects by me.
  • Actual factual googly eyes!

    (Because googly eyes are sorely under-represented in games, that's why)

Great for a quick distraction while watching TV, or a way to while away a couple of hours.  

Suitable for all ages.
